tool_description:
Uganda Vehicle Import Taxes made easy. 
Motoka UG provides a quick and accessible way to calculate your vehicle’s import tax obligations to Uganda.
name: Motoka UG
title: Motoka UG

api_list.name: Search By ID
api_list.description: This provides the ability to search by ID. The ID can be retrieved by using the other endpoints.

api_list.name: Tax value by model, make year

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Possible Value: 'full' or 'quick'. If Type = 'quick', response only includes tax valuation. If Type = 'full' then response also includes import duty, environmental levy, infrastructure levy, VAT and with-holding tax

api_list.name: Tax value by model, make, year, trim

required_parameters.name: trim
required_parameters.description: Trim of vehicle e.g. ABA-UD20 or 2L

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Possible Value: 'full' or 'quick'. If Type = 'quick', response only includes tax valuation. If Type = 'full' then response also includes import duty, environmental levy, infrastructure levy, VAT and with-holding tax

api_list.name: Tax valuation by search term
api_list.description: Retrieve tax valuation based on search term

required_parameters.name: searchtext
required_parameters.description: search term to be identified e.g. Nissan Murano 2003

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Possible Value: 'full' or 'quick'. If Type = 'quick', response only includes tax valuation. If Type = 'full' then response also includes import duty, environmental levy, infrastructure levy, VAT and with-holding tax

api_list.name: All models
api_list.description: Retrieve all models related to a specified make/brand of vehicle

api_list.name: All makes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motokaug.p.rapidapi.com/make"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motokaug.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://motokaug.p.rapidapi.com/make"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motokaug.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
